data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: There is a trend to develop strategies that focus on sustainable development and preservation of biological hot spots. The mo__ successful strat_____ always inte_____ the lo___ communities i_ protecting a__ conserving t__ ecological reso_____. Non-government agen____ are beco____ increasingly invo____ in acqu_____ conservation rese____ and mana____ them dire____. There is also increasing acknowledgement and implementation of traditional management strategies.
data.answer: 目前有一种趋势是制定侧重于可持续发展和保护生物热点的战略。最成功的策略总是整合当地社区来保护和保存生态资源。非政府机构越来越多地参与到自然保护区的收购和直接管理中来。对传统管理策略的认识和实施也越来越多。
